48g PROTEIN
Specialty

BBQ CHICKEN PROTEIN PIZZA

Tangy BBQ chicken protein pizza. 48g protein with smoky sweet flavor.

48g
Protein
460
Calories
38m
Total Time
2
Yield

Nutrition per 1/2 pizza

Carbs38g
Fat16g
Fiber4g
Sugar12g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 1 protein pizza crust
  • 60ml BBQ sauce
  • 100g shredded mozzarella
  • 100g grilled chicken, shredded
  • 30g red onion, thinly sliced
  • Fresh cilantro
  • 15g smoked gouda

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prepare

Par-bake protein crust for 8 minutes.

2

Sauce

Spread BBQ sauce over crust.

3

Layer

Add mozzarella, then chicken and onions.

4

Bake

Bake at 425¬∞F for 10 minutes.

5

Finish

Top with smoked gouda and fresh cilantro.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
